contenido:
Luella Vedric, New York socialite and animal advocate answers questions
...
When did you give up wearing fur?
-- Terry Mulley, Columbus

When I realized how wicked a practice it was! And when I realized one could look gorgeous without wearing fur, of course! You know I am now a major contributor to SPOMA [Society for the Prevention of Misuse of Animals]. Collie [SPOMA director Catherine Carnes] is one of my dearest friends.

Do you support other animal rights groups like PETA? What do you think about more forceful advocates like ELF, AJL, and SPEAC?
-- Don Rabinowitz, New York

I think I need some alphabet soup to figure them all out! But really dear, I support SPOMA, but I don't like violent groups. I'm against violence towards any animal and people are just another kind of animal.
...
Do you have any pets, besides Lily, that is?
-- Donna Ghostley, Richmond

I have an enormous tropical fish habitat at home. I love tropical fish! And they are very well cared for. Mr. Kim, my supplier, is always checking up on how they are doing. I have the most wonderful Zebra fish and rays and arrowanas.
[Luella Vedric and her poodle Lily at a SPOMA fundraiser. John Hammer, Tamarack News Service]
